comment:
Nose - sweet carmel / wood / oak
Taste - honey/leathery tobacco 
Finish- quick medicinal / baking spice

Huge improvement over normal Jack
Vanilla, caramel, very ripe bananas, quite alcoholic, sharp rather than smooth.
very rich of jack daniel's tast, for the fans it might be a new favorite, for single scotch lovers it is definently not the one just like every other whisky.
A little thin. I was expecting a stronger flavor por a 100 proof
Very similar flavor to No. 7 with less bitter bite.
Sweet, mild spices and leather, throat warming
